Title: A Worthy Challenge: Xin the Weaponmaster
Description:
$n, I need you to assemble a nimble group and lead them into Mogu'shan Palace. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and put an end to Xin the Weaponmaster.

Return to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Mogu'shan Palace Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Mogu'shan Palace Challenge Mode
